title: I hope you can find a 3080 Ti in stock - EVGA FTW3 Ultra
description: Head to  and activate Honey for free to start saving today! Thanks to Honey for sponsoring this video.  The EVGA GeForce RTX 3080 Ti FTW3 ULTRA is an impressive card but what will be more impressive is finding one in stock. Alex gives you at least a taste of what you can expect when you finally get one.   Check out the EVGA GeForce RTX 3080 Ti FTW3 ULTRA at   Buy Glorious PC Gaming Model O Wireless On Amazon (PAID LINK):  On Newegg (PAID LINK):   Buy the Logitech G915 TKL Mechanical Gaming Keyboard at   Buy ASUS ROG PG259QN 360hz Gaming Monitor On Amazon (PAID LINK):  On Newegg (PAID LINK):  On B&H (PAID LINK):   Check out the Digital Storm Velox Gaming PC at   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.
